description: An ARO file is a server side web page file that is generated with SteelArrow Web Application. It contains HTML and SteelArrow tags and scripts. These are executed on server to generate complete response page before sending these to userâ€™s browser. ARO files contain almost 95% of HTML content while the remaining consists of SteelArrow code. For ARO files to work for you, SteelArrow Web Applications server should be installed and running on the web server machine.
